name: The Data Weaver
description: A sleek exoskeleton woven from flexible datalines and reinforced carbon fiber, designed to allow the wearer near-instantaneous access to any network they can reach.

flavor.rationale: In a world where information is power, the ability to seamlessly interface with networks directly through your body would be invaluable for hackers, corporate spies, or anyone looking to stay ahead of the curve. This armor allows for direct neural interfacing and data manipulation without the need for external devices.
